attributes.action: Stop giving Foreign Aid while we need all the money here at home .
attributes.additional_details: I believe it’s wrong to give money to China and India the new super powers.
attributes.background: Stop sending our taxes abroad while every penny is needed here at home

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Stop all foreign aid
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700263
